lyrics:
29 contributorsdear lover lyricsverse 1 leighanne
ive seen some places and so many faces
but you look like home tonight
you crave attention and i need affection
so lets walk the silver line

all you need is my all you need is my love

all i need is your all i need is your touch
baby thats all im askin of ya

dear lover
im incapable of savin your heart this time
but if you wanna
ill pretend to be your hero for just tonight

ill pretend to be your hero for just tonight

youve been believing theres more to this feelin
i swear i wish there was
but when the moment is over well walk away closer
and maybe thats good enough
